title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Review of programming practices and code-reuse; Object model and objectoriented concepts; Object-oriented programming languages and implementation; Object-oriented analyses and design using UML structural, behavioral and architectural modeling; Unified development process, Software reuse design patterns, components and framework; Distributed object computing, interoperability and middleware standards COM/DCOM and CORBA; Object-oriented database system data model, object definition and query language, objectrelational system.
